generateSocialPostContentPromptDescripti: Write an idea for your social media content and our system will help you generate it. We have prepared a sample message in the message field so you can see how the system works.
generateSocialPostImageContentPromptDesc: Upload an image to generate text for it. You can also let AI edit the image or generate an image completely from text. We have prepared a sample message in the message field so you can see how the system works.
summarizeArticlePromptDescription: Let AI summarize any article for you. Just paste the article text and AI will create a summary for you.

randomArticle.LOCAL_SINGER: Karel Gott was a Czech singer, who was often called the "Golden Voice of Prague". During his career spanning over five decades, he released nearly 300 albums, selling tens of millions of records worldwide, making him the most successful male singer in Czech history.
randomArticle.LOCAL_ACTOR: Vladimír Menšík was one of the most popular Czech actors and comedians. He appeared in numerous films and television shows throughout his career, becoming a household name in Czechoslovakia. Despite his health issues, he continued performing until his death in 1988.
randomArticle.LOCAL_ACTRESS: Jiřina Bohdalová is a renowned Czech actress with a career spanning over seven decades. She has appeared in numerous films, television shows, and theater productions, becoming one of the most recognizable faces in Czech entertainment.
randomArticle.LOCAL_MUSICIAN: Bedřich Smetana was a Czech composer who pioneered the development of a musical style that became closely identified with his country's aspirations to independent statehood. He is widely regarded as the father of Czech music.
randomArticle.LOCAL_CHEF: Zdeněk Pohlreich is a Czech chef and television personality, known for his appearances on various cooking shows. He has significantly influenced modern Czech gastronomy and owns several successful restaurants in Prague.
randomArticle.LOCAL_WRITER: Karel Čapek was a Czech writer, playwright and critic. He is best known for his science fiction work and for introducing the word 'robot' to the English language and science fiction as a whole through his play R.U.R.
randomArticle.LOCAL_AUTHOR: Božena Němcová was a Czech writer who wrote the classic novel 'Babička' (The Grandmother). She is often regarded as the mother of Czech prose and played a significant role in the Czech National Revival movement.
